imac.obstacle

Class Meteor

  • java.lang.Object
    • imac.obstacle.Meteor
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Box, Pyramid, Sphere

    public class Meteor
extends java.lang.Object
    Meteor is the parent class to create geometric obstacles
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Charlie
